Это худшая покупка из всех, даже с 75 % скидкой покупать не стоит, баланса в этой игре нет, либо ты сидишь в лобби 30 минут и потом Press m1 to win за мана или бегаешь по карте за сурва в надежде, что этот псевдо-нагибатор тебя не положит одним хитом, если у тебя нет друзей с которыми ты будешь играть в нее , то проходи мимо, сохранишь деньги, время и нервы.

Sin lugar a dudas mi juego favorito, cuando dice asimétrico me encanta porque lo aleatorio que pueden ser las partidas no tiene nombre. Y a pesar de que si hay un poco de toxicidad, el 65% de las partidas son graciosas y un poco estresantes. Se mantiene constantemente actualizado, generan eventos y comenzaron a escuchar a la comunidad.."cosa que ya era hora". Muy recomendado para jugar con amigos!!

Merece ganar el puesto de juego con mayor dedicación y amor, debido a la atención de los bugs que solucionan por medio de las constantes actualizaciones, que solucionan problemas. También los constantes eventos que realizan, sin lugar a dudas el amor que le tienen y el escuchar a la comunidad es una dicha. Siempre con amor al DBD.

I played this game for ~2 years, and I don't recommend that any gives BHVR any money at all.  They squander the money and failed projects like Deathgarden, and still haven't fixed core issues with the game since it was launched 3+ years ago.  On top of that, they are constantly breaking things that were working perfectly, like the audio, and then do absolutely nothing to fix it.  The engine update that they performed back in November 2019, broke so many things, especially the audio, and this game relies on audio for ~60% of the game play.

Instead of wasting your money on this piece of crap of a game, spend it on something better.  In the end, you'll be much happier.  The number of players for this game continue to drop, and it's not to far from numbers indicating that the game is in a death spiral.  Once the daily players drops below 9,000, there is no recovery from that.

前々からこのゲームの悪評は聞いていたが、セールが来たのでフレとしぶしぶ購入

PT非推奨なのはゲームのシステム的にという事でしょう。
VCPTの情報共有もキラーを倒せるわけでもないので共有したとこで結局死にますし･･･
ガチ勢ではないのでランクやら勝率やらも気にしてませんから
その辺りは気楽に楽しめる要因の一つかもしれません。
仲間内で騒いでやる分には十分楽しめると思います。

やる前の悪評で「バランスが悪い」「キラーが強すぎる」等々見てきましたが
遊んでみた感じレベルが高かろうが低かろうが死ぬときは死ぬので
言うほど酷いバランスのゲームだとは感じませんでした
第一、そういうゲームですしやる事やってれば死んでも結構ポイント入るので気になりませんでした。

※ホラー映画的に言うと生存者が助かるハッピーエンドはあんまり好きくないタイプです※

これよりも治安の悪いゲームを遊んできたって経験もありますが
今のところ、プレイ環境的に過去最悪の治安の悪さだったと思っている「CoD BO」に比べたら
(あくまでクラン戦等の一個人の感想です)全然気になりませんでした。


結論：色々な悪評見てきたけど全然普通でした

고인물 망겜. 초보자를 위한 배려는 찾아보려 해도 단 한 개조차 보이지 않는 망겜이다. 애초에 레벨 시스템 자체가 고인물과 초보자를 극명하게 나눌 수 있다. 물론 경험에서 나오는 차이가 있겠지만, 초반에 낄 수 있는 퍽이나 아이템 수를 보면 그냥 개노가다 식으로 죽으면서 하라는 게임이다. 가장 마음에 안드는 것은 갓 게임에 입문한 초보자를 양학하고, 바로 접게 만드는 플레이를 선보여주는 고인물들이다. 지금까지 6시간을 돌렸지만 단 한판도 배려를 받지 못했다. 오히려 양학한다는 그 재미를 느끼는것 같다. 
이들의 문제점도 있지만 말도 안되는 매칭 시스템도 꼽을 수 있다. 물론 많은 시간이 지난만큼 청정수는 없을거고, 그렇기 때문에 고인물과의 매칭 시스템도 어느정도 이해할만하다. 이 게임을 하려면 많은 지식같은건 필요없고, 그냥 다크소울처럼 처 맞으면서 커라. 그 외에 해결책은 정말로 못 찾겠다.

So I have played Dead by Daylight for quite some time and I think that I am ready to write an review. Dead by Daylight is horror multiplayer coop game in which 4 survivors try to escape 1 killer. They have to fix generators to escape but that will be hard because killer can easily find them. It is fun and I like that they added horror movie characters like Michael Myers, Freddy Krueger, Pig from Saw. Not all DLCs are great but my favourite is Stranger Things DLC, it is worth money. Game is worth full price but I would recommend you to wait until it is on sale because every time it is 8 euros and that is really cheap for quality of this game. Now downsides. A lot of killers are campers and a lot of players are toxic. There are a lot of bugs and glitches in this game that can lead to your defeat. Hit boxes can be really.. confusing and that MUST be fixed. Good game, I will rate it with okay/10.

"sunk cost fallacy"
I learned that term from Josh Strife Hayes. 
Earlier I was sitting in queue for of course 30 minutes and I started to think "Why do I still play this game?" 
I don't necessarily enjoy playing the matches I do finally get into. The game is very buggy and unbalanced. Everyone is constantly pissed off and crying. And the only small bits of enjoyment I do get from the game is when I'm not playing it properly and am just messing with other players.
 But that's when it occurred to me. I play it because I've already invested money into the base game & DLCs as well as an unhealthy amount of playtime purely through the addictive rush of wondering how the next match will slightly play out differently than the other hundreds that came before it. The same rush I get when I play known to be terrible games like MOBAs and Battle Royales. And that's when I recalled a video talking about dying MMOs that sums up my experience with DBD perfectly. The devs do not care about the balance or well being of their game or players. They take MONTHS and in some cases YEARS to fix game breaking *features* while it only takes them less than a month to drop the next premium skin collection. 
I have made several reviews for this game flipping between YES and NO but every time I change it to YES, it's me just trying to cope with my already wasted money and time. Will I continue to play? Of course. But if there was a switch I could flip that would save everyone from buying into this game I would Flex Tape it in an instant.

Всем привет и сейчас я хочу поделится своим мнением об игре Dead by Daylight
Начну я думаю с минусов -
1. Частый даунгрейд маньяков: например Легион,Гоуст фейс,Фредди Крюгер и Кожанное лицо.
2. Достаточно часто можно встретить токсичное комьюнити и это очень мешает например: Вы играете за сурва и вдруг вас нокает свинья которая вешает вас в подвале и кемперит за углом и когда вас сниают она сразу выбегает и опять нокает вас и вешает на крюк!
Ну а теперь перейдём к плюсам + ДБДешки
1.В этой игре вы можете встретить сурвов и маньяков из таких популярных фильмов как:Техасская резня бензопилой,Крик,Хеллоуин,Кошмар на улице вязов, а также из сериала Очень странные дела,Пила. А также большое количество других маньяков и сурвов
2.Хорошая оптимизация.
3. Разработчики которые следят и фиксят баги 
4. Одна из самы активных игр в которые я играл!
Я очень советую эту игры несмотря на ёё минусы!
Надеюсь я помог вам!
Всем удачи и пока!

9/10 Honest Review Of My Opinion.

This game is fucking insane
Like, really insane. You wanna shit your pants. Here ya go.

Some killers are very overpowered (COUGH COUGH DEMOGORGON) and will eat you right up, I play as killer most of the time and survivor sometimes.

Pros: 

Great community (most of the time) and anyone with a Scoops Ahoy costume are nice people.

Very fun on both sides. The killer is fun to run around with and do stupid shit while blasting music with your buddies watching. And survivor is great for doing stupid shit while running around and screaming about the killer eating your ass.

Bloody terrifying sometimes and you will scream like a girl when facing the doctor, people will DC just because of how terrifying he is.

Survive with friends is fun if you dont just sweat the whole game and instead fuck around.

Cons:

NOED (No One Escapes Death)

Franklins Demise 

Dead By Flashlights

Insta Heals

Letting the last person die to use the hatch

MICHEAL FUCKING MYERS

And basically anything else that is unbalanced and or unfun to fight against.

But it is 100% worth the buy, and you dont need any DLC to have fun, Its a if you want to thing. But really, I cannot recommend it enough. Get it, Play it, Shit yourself.
seru parah ,gw sampe orgasme ,translate = this game is amazing ,i like

Nonostante i suoi innumerevoli problemi, i quali lagspikes, ping alto, bug e alcune meccaniche di gioco rotte devo dire che non è male come titolo. Dead by Daylight è di sicuro uno dei miei titoli preferiti: Non saprai mai come si svolgerà la partita, contro chi ti ritroverai contro, con quali persone lavorerai per fuggire dalla partita, se insieme o da solo e sopratutto, [b] Ci sono molti modi per personalizzare la propria esperienza di gioco[/b].
La possibilità di creare le più bizzarre combinazioni di competenze spinge il giocatore a provare, provare e riprovare il gioco con retrogusti sempre più diversi, e questo grazie anche all'uso di vari oggetti. L'uso di competenze e oggetti di conseguenza, possono cambiare il vostro stile di gioco e l'esito della partita! Vuoi essere il medico della squadra? Colui che ripara i generatori? L'esca? Con le competenze e un po' d'esperienza tutto si può fare.

         [u] Ma le competenze non si limitano solo ai survivor [/u]

Fare il killer in mia opinione è molto più difficile che fare il sopravvissuto, poiché bisogna prestare molta più attenzione ai sopravvissuti dal momento che voi siete 1v4 ed il gioco sembra essere dalla parte dei survivor, ma da anche un esperienza di gioco completamente diversa. Ogni killer è dotato di un proprio potere come ad esempio il cacciatore con le trappole o il mandriano con la motosega, ed esso può essere modificato nei modi più svariati possibili tramite l'uso di accessori (come i survivor solo che il potere non ce l'hanno).

[h1] Facciamo il punto! [/h1]

- Gioco intrigante, strategico
- Variabilità elevata, ogni partita è nuova grazie ai diversi layout
- Gameplay plasmabile a proprio piacimento grazie a varie abilità

- Bug, Lag, Bugabuse, Ping alti, Lobby da killer troppo lunghe
- Grafica non proprio la migliore
- Meccaniche di gioco e survivors sbilanciati.

[b] Voto finale: 8/10 [/b]

Je commence par tout ce qui ne me plait pas  puis je continue avec le bon . J'affronte des personnes qui ont plus de 11 ou même 14 de niveaux de plus que moi je ne comprend vraiment pas pourquoi je ne suis pas avec des personnes de mon niveau de plus toutes les personnes avec qui je joue respecte pas les débutants alors que vraiment ce jeu est plutôt bien mais les joueurs débutants ne sont pas mis a l'aise , je ne vois pas en quoi sert les niveaux de ce jeux car j'affronte des personnes qui y joue 24 h sur 24 h alors que moi j'y joue que deux ou trois fois par mois mais  tous cela arrive rarement mais c'est quand même embêtent ensuite pour chaque partie jouée les files d'attentes sont beaucoup trop longues 5 min 7 min parfois 10 ou 12 min j'en peux plus alors que je suis un fan . 

je le recommande car en enlevant ces petits défauts. Ce jeu et génial ou les joueurs peuvent s'amusés est ce regroupés pour passer du bon temps , bien sur tous le monde n'est pas pareil il y en n'a qui son gentille est qui comprenne le probléme est qui on de humour alors que autre préfére ce moques, bien sur il y en n'a sur tous les jeux mais bon . 
Entre amis ce jeux est le meilleur . Voila c'est mon point de vue ;)

Error 404 - This game sucks ass.

This used to be a good game. Now anytime survivors get a semi decent perk it's nerfed into the ground because killers whine they mom doesn't love them if they don't get 4k every match. I have played killer too it's not hard to get a few kills each match using basic mechanics like tracking god forbid you learn to play people, I've gotten immensely better as a killer by learning to play survivor and how survivors think and act. I don't expect to survive every match or get kills every match but I like to have fun, but it doesn't become fun when you get tunneled or camped the whole match. Sure running a killer around is fun until they put hook spawns closer, made pallets spawn further away, add aura seeing perks for killers for just about everything, now several exit/exhaustion blocking perks god forbid I wanna escape can't use a window, or my lithe/dead hard/etc so now your only choice is to walk away from a killer that walks faster than you and is gaining bloodlust.

Killers all bitch and whine and cry literally wanting to remove SWF (I hope they do remove it so it can kill the game and watch as killers wait even longer between matches). Stealth isn't a thing now really might as well run across the map, oh and all the mori perks those are awesome nothing like being killed instantly after your first hook (but decisive strike was op and apparently still is, and so was meddle of man now they are basically useless). Killer is ok but not a ton of skill is involved anymore when perks basically scream at you where someone is, a couple of tracking perks you'll see every so often killers run. I haven't really seen a survivor meta perk build I've seen some common ones but nowhere near as common as a killer meta. It's bullshit when damn near every killers runs same perk all the time you can basically count on altering gameplay around those perks, bbq and chili, noed (let's reward killers for not killing anyone all game but being able to escape one chase with Decisive strike was too much and apparently game breakiing). 

I don't play killer all that much because I prefer to play with my friends but playing as a killer isn't as hard as everyone makes it out to be playing as a survivor sucks ass sometimes you have a fair match with a few deaths few runs other times you get stomped, but it is common to get really shitty matches, where a killer tunnels and camps you so now you spend the entire match hanging from a hook and dieing only to be called trash at the end. I would get fun matches where all 4 players died and it wasn't so bad but now it's just shitty it's not even fun anymore.

I've put a lot of hours in but I cannot take this game anymore it's becoming more toxic as the community grows larger, where all they want is to sell killer dlc and people bitch survivors didn't start on the hook for them. Hell survivors can be toxic too some are asshats to the killer (no looping isn't toxic it's our only defense what else do you expect you fucked stealth, the game can go from fun to boring as soon as a killer decides to be a douche), others sandbag you by running a killer over you, they drop pallets in your face so the killer can whack you, etc survivors aren't innocent but atm they have the shit end of the stick. I don't regret my early hours of play through as it used to be a fun game now I get FUN BUGS SUCH AS NOT GETTING TO USE ANY ABILITIES, INCLUDING E PERKS, AND OTHERS SUCH AS HEALING... ANYTHING, BUT WAIT THERE'S MORE! STRUGGLING! That's all fun going into a match and being completely fucked over and losing a rare item or getting moried about instantly.

Fuck this game fuck the community it used to be good I still love this game it holds a special place as I've met friends through it and had many laughs but it's utter and complete shit now it's not fun anymore to be a survivor killer yeah esp cause you get to join in about bitching about survivors and suggesting how to nerf a survivors perks that don't let you get 4k, you can be a totaly douche nozzle and hold matches hostage!

I don't recommend this game anymore don't give them anymore money play literally anything else. I may come off as a salty survivor but I've played killer I like tracking and stuff but it's not super prevalent most common now is just getting an aura around a survivor for just about anything (waiting on the one that shows you a survivor as they walk or breath), it's just trying to play with friends is ass anymore since most of the game is "balanced" (if you can even call it that) around a 4 stack but there is no voice chat or dedicated servers and even then it's ass. That fuckin killer with shitty internet, oh yeah that man is gonna have a field day with you his hits will register when you're clear across a map hopping a window and pallet stunning his ass! Fun right! When your perks activate but like don't that's so fun watching you activate a perk and it does nothing!

Revised cause steams asking, it's still shit and still toxic it's the only game really that does this type of genre so it's addictive but it's still shit, it just has no competition.

Steam asking again, no still whining killer mains even more surv nerf, I have played both sides and neither side was fun but ya devs lets over correct to killer side because they just cry all the time. I'm addicted to the game and I hate so, but I hope one of these times I uninstall it for good, don't waste your time. This game requires too much investment to not get steam rolled by a killer, 200 hours ahh look a baby player, I have 1k hours I still find people with way more hours than me. Don't even bother let this game die like it belongs.

Esse jogo possui um erro que se você tiver o infortúnio de tê-lo, é o fim.
O erro é o 8013, relacionado ao app anti cheat do jogo e o que diz que sua steam está offline.
Estou há meses esperando patches ou soluções e após dissecar a internet eu não achei um.
Eu queria muito reembolso mesmo tendo jogado bastante pq o jogo apenas acumula poeira pois é IMPOSSÍVEL jogar novamente.
O jogo é interessante mas o review é negativo já que não posso jogá-lo.
Caso vc não seja azarado, compra aí ué, whatever.
